item.title: Everest Base Camp Trek - What should you know before you start?
item.description: If you are planning to prepare to trek Everest Base Camp by yourself, then this article would help you to get a picture of what to know before you proceed further. The Everest Base Camp Trek is a challenging and rewarding adventure that takes you to the base of the highest mountain in the world. Here are some things you should know before you start: Physical Fitness: The Everest Base Camp Trek
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Everest Base Camp Trek, Start Trekking from Salleri and back to Salleri
item.description: If you are planning to prepare to trek Everest Base Camp by yourself, then this article would help you to get a picture of where you can start your trek. I have read through many articles & videos and found the best route for trekking. item.title: Solo Everest Base Camp Trek, Bangalore to Kathmandu then to Salleri
item.description: If you are planning to trek Solo to Everest Base Camp by yourself from Bangalore, then this article will help you to get a picture of how to reach Salleri from Bangalore, where Salleri will be the starting point of Trek to Everest Base Camp. item.title: Solo Everest Base Camp Trek, What to pack?
item.description: If you are planning to prepare to trek Everest Base Camp by yourself, then this article would help you to get a picture of what you might need to pack in your backpack. Packing proper equipment, clothing & quick energy foods will help you to do your trek bit smoothly. item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Dal Bhat Recipe - Nepali Style
item.description: Dal Bhat or Nepali Dal Bhat, is a dish made of lentils and rice, actually It is considered that this is the national dish of Nepal. Generally the rice is either boiled or steamed and It is served in the middle of the dish and surrounded by the dal or lentils and sometimes with some other curries or chutney or with a pickle. For people, Dal Bhat is easy to cook and it can be cooked with other flav
item.dc:creator: Reddamma D
